mapper.insert: insert into product_image (name, description, size_jumbo, size_large, size_regular, size_small, size_thumbnail, type, product_id) values (#{name}, #{description}, #{sizeJumbo}, #{sizeLarge}, #{sizeRegular}, #{sizeSmall}, #{sizeThumbnail}, #{type}, #{productId})
mapper.update: update product_image set name = #{name}, description = #{description}, size_jumbo = #{sizeJumbo}, size_large = #{sizeLarge}, size_regular = #{sizeRegular}, size_small = #{sizeSmall}, size_thumbnail = #{sizeThumbnail} where image_id = #{imageId}
